summary: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

Gallegos|Brian Gleason|Harry Zinn|Josh Berry|William Sterchi|Valerie Adams|Chris Bentley|Derek Blakeney|Cade Borek|Luke Borek|Tina Borek|Steven Ray Byrd|Cindy Cook|Annie Corley|Chad DeGroot|Hayley Derryberry|John H. Euber|Jeffrey Feingold|Nicole Gramlich|Brent Lambert|Cynthia Lee|Beth Lucero|Michael Neal Powell|David T. Quan|James Rishe|Denny Shoopman|J. Nathan Simmons|Blake Williams
title: Corazón rebelde
